<title level="1" pfs="">[Cyclops Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2304)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Cyclops Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2304)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 275

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A cyclops zombie is permanently slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 160
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Resistances**
Resist: All 7 (except [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) and critical hits)

**Weaknesses**
critical hits 14, positive 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +17 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning

</column>
name: Cyclops Zombie
